West Midland Bird Club

Serving birdwatchers and ornithologists in the four English counties of Staffordshire, Warwickshire, Worcestershire and the Metropolitan West Midlands since 1929.

News

Stills from our appearance on 'Nature's Calendar'.

Services

News of recent bird sightings.

Branches in Birmingham, Kidderminster, Solihull, Stafford & Tamworth organise Indoor Meetings & Field Trips.

Our publications and other books, bird reports, magazine articles and videos about local birds and birding.

Our County Recorders welcome details of birds you have seen in the region.

Research, surveys and other scientific work undertaken by the Club.

We have reserves and permit schemes at: Belvide, Blithfield, Gailey, Harborne and Ladywalk; and hold other activites at: Cannock Chase, Kinsgbury Water Park and Bodenham Arboretum.

Information

Where to see birds: in Staffordshire, in Warwickshire, in Worcestershire and in the West Midlands County.

Diary of local birding and other natural history events.

County lists: All the birds seen in the West Midland region.

Product Reviews: Books, CDs, DVDs and other items of interest to birders.

Miscellany.
